full_summary:
**Sweeper-Scrubber Procurement Opportunity**
================================κτή================================

**Contract Reference**: cb-210-25654218

**Amendment**: 9

**Solicitation Number**: W8476-246825/A

**Publication Date**: 2023-12-07

**Closing Date**: 2024-01-31T14:00:00

**Contract Details**:

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Please refer to Tender Description or Tender Documents
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except NCR) and Quebec (except NCR)

**Contract Description**

The National Defence Headquarters is seeking proposals for the procurement of Sweepers-Scrubbers, self-propelled, Hybrid - propane gas and battery powered. The procurement will be for 2 units with Integrated Logistics Support (ILS) deliverables to be delivered to Greenwood, Ontario, and Valcartier, Quebec.

An unfunded option to procure an additional 2 units is also available to be exercised within 12 months of contract award. The requested delivery date is 180 days after contract award.

There are no security requirements associated with this procurement.

**Key Documents**

For detailed information, please refer to the attached documents:

* Amendment 9 to the RFP (English) [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27043/en-w8476-246825-a-amendment-001.pdf)
* Amendment 9 to the RFP (French) [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27043/fr-w8476-246825-a-amendement-003.pdf)
* Original RFP document [link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27043/en-w8476-246825-a-original_0.pdf)

**Contact Information**

* Mylene Faguy
* DLP 5-3-2
* Email: mylene.faguy@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (343) 598-9302

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any future procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.  If you have any questions or require further clarification, please do
